description.text: A slightly flammable outer wall protects a more substantial keep. Two Cubes and a Base.

ru.original: A slightly flammable outer wall protects a more substantial keep. Two Cubes and a Base.
ru.translation: Массивная крепость с внешними стенами из воспламенимого материала. Два куба и база.

es.original: A slightly flammable outer wall protects a more substantial keep. Two Cubes and a Base.
es.translation:
Un muro externo protege cada fortaleza.
Dos generadores y un núcleo.

de.original: A slightly flammable outer wall protects a more substantial keep. Two Cubes and a Base.
de.translation: Eine leicht entflammbare Außenwand schützt eine zähe Festung. Zwei Generatoren und eine Basis.

fr.original: A slightly flammable outer wall protects a more substantial keep. Two Cubes and a Base.
fr.translation: Une forteresse aux murs extérieurs inflammables. Deux cubes et une base.

pt.original: A slightly flammable outer wall protects a more substantial keep. Two Cubes and a Base.
pt.translation: Uma barreira ligeiramente inflamável protege uma fortaleza de grande porte. Dois Cubos e uma Base.
